thread.title: Jim and Susan Williams
thread.title_full: Homeadvisor reviewed by Jim and Susan Williams

author: Jim and Susan Williams
title: Jim and Susan Williams
text: Our projects were in another state, so we used Homeadvisor to find local contractors. One was to put on a back deck porch, and another cleared the debris when our home burned down during the Gatlinburg fires. We were totally devastated, and didn't know where to begin. Home advisor was just what we needed.
